title: Burn Valley Vengeance
description: An unusual spree of crimes is plaguing the country roads and canyons of Burn Valley in western Montrose County, Colorado. Deputy Preston Rayburn suspects they might be related but he doesn't know how. But all that takes a backseat in his mind the night he comes upon the accident at the intersection of County Roads 141 & 145. Inside one of the vehicles gravely injured is Carrie Reynolds, the secret love of his life.
author: Sharlene Nusser
